thread.title: WES SHAW
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by WES SHAW

author: WES SHAW
title: WES SHAW
text: I tried buying from the "Best" place but they had all my points wrapped up in a customer appreciation deal and then threw them away...along with me. I don't know why I ever strayed from NFM. They've always had knowledgeable, courteous staff, honest pricing, a reliable return policy, and superior selection. I don't have any idea why I thought I could save a buck going somewhere else. After all, it's what you're really looking for. Someone to trust. They're still living on the legacy vision of "sell cheap and tell the truth." and as long as they do, I'm buying from them.
